description: Save time with ready-marinated, mouth-wateringly saucy drumsticks for dinner.
keywords: BBQ chicken,Microwave,High fibre,High protein,Low sugar,Dinner Made Easy,Chicken
name: Easy Barbecue Chicken Drumsticks Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1kg Simply Cook Chicken Drumsticks with Sweet BBQ Glaze

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180Â°C and line a baking tray with baking paper. Spread chicken on tray in a single layer and bake for 40 minutes.
Just before chicken has finished cooking, pierce packet of corn and microwave for 5 minutes following pack instructions.
Place pasta salad and coleslaw in a large bowl and toss together. Serve chicken with corn and salad.
